dialogue.text: Hello there! My name is Snowdrift. I'm here to help you set up a new profile.
Profiles work as separate saves to allow multiple people to play the game with their own data, therefore not overwriting high
scores and such. Controls are global, though, so you'll have to deal with controls being changed if multiple people play on your
PC. Plus, you can also set your birthday and get a special achievement if you play on your birthday!
So, you ready? Let's get you set up. Press the H key if you need more information on anything.
